DOC.brief_summary: Thirty complete maxillary denture wearer recruit obtain informed consent . One investigator measure Shore D hardness commercially available RDLs use Vesmeter® . The salivary flow rate pH value occlusal force measure patient initiation study . T-tests Pearson 's correlation coefficient use statistical analysis . A p-value < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.brief_title: Deterioration Resilient Denture Liners Patient Characteristics
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Participants This study approve Human Ethics Committee Nihon University School Dentistry , Matsudo ( EC 13-006 ) . Thirty wearer complete maxillary denture ( 12 men ; mean age , 71.8 ± 9.2 year 18 woman ; mean age , 70.2 ± 10.7 year ) visit Department Removable Prosthodontics institute recruit study . The volunteer enrol provide write informed consent . Complete maxillary denture wearer treat tissue conditioner , RDLs , denture adhesive exclude . Before start clinical trial , participant ask follow environmental factor questionnaire : smoking , drinking , denture wear sleeping , denture cleanser usage . After specimen make , participant instruct wear denture per normal routine . 2 . Specimen Preparation A cylinder shape six place 4-mm diameter 2-mm depth , drill inner surface denture base . Then , RDL material mixed product , packed cavity , polymerized room temperature . The six commercial RDLs use study : Evatouch Super ( EVA ; Neo Dental Chemical product , Washington , USA ) , GC RELINE ( GCR ; GC Dental Products Corp , Tokyo , Japan ) , Mucopren soft ( MCP ; Kettenbach GmbH & Co KG , California , USA ) Soften ( SFT ; KAMEMIZU CHEM , Osaka , Japan ) , FD Soft ( FDS ; KAMEMIZU CHEM , Osaka , Japan ) , Bio Liner ( BIO ; Nissin Dental Products , Kyoto , Japan ) . Hardness measure use Vesmeter® ( WaveCyber Corp , Saitama , Japan ) . When probe , include built-in position sensor connect personal computer , place perpendicular orientation RDL , indenter probe depress onto RDL constant speed electromagnetic power . Simultaneously , path indenter constantly trace position sensor . The computer process electrical signal measure device calculate Shore D hardness , primary outcome present study . The investigator measure hardness appointment . The original hardness hardness 1 month oral exposure use analysis . Each specimen measure five time , high low value eliminate calculation mean representative value specimen . The specimen embed denture measure hot plate maintain temperature 37°C close oral temperature possible . 3 . Statistical Analyses Before statistical analysis , normality data test use Kolmogorov - Smirnov test , parametric statistical method applied.Two-way repeat measure analysis variance ( ANOVA ) material type ( EVA , MCP , GCR , FDS , SFT , BIO ) time period ( baseline one month ) factor use assess change hardness six RDLs time . The Tukey-Kramer test use post hoc test two-way repeat measure ANOVA .The effect categorical variable sex , smoking , drinking , denture wear sleeping , denture cleanser usage hardness RDLs analyze use two-way ANOVA without post hoc test ; interested compare RDL rather analyze effect categorical variable RDLs . The effect continuous variable , include age , salivary flow rate , occlusal force , analyze use Pearson 's correlation coefficient . All statistical analysis perform use IBM® SPSS® Statistics 21 ( IBM , Armonk , NY , USA ) . A p-value < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: wear maxillary complete denture treat tissue conditioner , RDLs , denture adhesive exclude show obvious cognitive impairment could understand write spoken Japanese
